info.title: OPERA Cloud Room Configuration API
info.description:
APIs to cater for room configuration, such as configuring room types, room Classes, creating new room features, or updating housekeeping room maintenance reasons.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.

get.description:
Fetch a properties Room Types. The request can be based on a properties Room class or Room Type. The operation returns a list of room types and a summary of the room types.

OperationId:getRoomTypes

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of hotel.

parameters.name: accessible
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if accessible room type should be fetched.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if inactive room types should be included.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

parameters.name: physical
parameters.description: Is it a physical sleep room type.

parameters.name: pseudo
parameters.description: Is it a pseudo room type.

parameters.name: summaryInfo
parameters.description: Flag to indicate if summary or detailed information should be fetched.

200.description: Response object for Fetching existing Room Types.

post.description:
Use this API to create new room types for a property. A list of new room types can be passed as part of the request to Use this API to create multiple rooms in one request.

parameters.name: roomTypesCriteria
